titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for greater flexibility in the number of levels of benefits that may be offered by certain health plans under chapter 89 of such title.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/18/2006--Introduced. Amends federal health insurance provisions to provide for greater flexibility in the number of levels of benefits that may be offered by certain health benefits plans under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program (FEHBP).
